text: The Hope Valley Amateur League is a football competition located in the Hope Valley, England. The league has three divisions.Divisions Hope Valley Amateur League ==Member clubs 2018–19== ===Premier Division=== * Ashover * Bamford * Baslow * ~~Bradwell Sports~~ * Buxworth * Chapel Town (new) * Dove Holes * Furness Vale * High Lane * ~~Melandra Castle~~ ===A Division=== * Blazing Rag * Chinley * Darley Dale Lions * Dove Holes Reserves * Dronfield Town 'A' * Fairfield * Hathersage * Stoney Middleton * Whaley Bridge Athletic Development * Youlgrave United ===B Division=== * Bakewell Town Reserves * Buxworth Reserves * Calver * Chapel Town Reserves (new) * Dronfield Woodhouse Sports & Social * JBM Sports (new) * New Tupton Ivanhoe (new) * Railway * Tansley Juniors (new) * Tideswell United Reserves * Tipsy Toad (new) * Winster (new) ==Honours== ===Recent divisional champions=== {| class="wikitable" |- !
